text: Good morning #Maldives
RT @SwannyDPM: This new site - http://t.co/8kwqGeXj – lets you work out the extra super you’ll receive thanks to the Govt’s mining tax # ...
Had a good meeting with Commonwealth Special Envoy. http://t.co/8RN1O3vE.  #maldives
@J_On_A_Mission. Good attitude,keep it up...! Thanks
The Gallipoli wars are a good example of reaching peace by taking lessons from misery. The spirit of our martyrs is a fad.
I arrive at the Book Fair that I will visit until 5 pm! #Book # FH2012 http://t.co/F7XWsApH
The book, a vector so important for culture, is today threatened. #Book # FH2012
There is no reading if there is no bookstore, we must protect our booksellers. #Book # FH2012
The culture, during these 5 years, was forgotten, abandoned. #Book # FH2012
The press asks me for my favorite work. I quote "Les miserables" and the works of Camus. #Book # FH2012
The entirety of my dialogue with the press this morning at the Salon du Livre is to be seen here: http://t.co/qsGoGdjj #Book # FH2012

President Sulaiman expressed his great sadness at the fall of three students due to the collapse of the wall of the Minya school and his sympathy with their families and colleagues and stressed the necessary investigations
Sleiman expressed his deep sorrow and condolences to the families and classmates of the 3 student victims of the Minieh school wall collapse
The political fight is an endless fight. And I am a fighter. #Camus #Book # FH2012
I am indefatigable, inexhaustible, those who hope for a relaxation have no chance! #Camus #Book # FH2012
Episode # 5 of our web series "Breadcrumb" follows @manuelvalls behind the scenes at the Marseille meeting: http://t.co/lCQK30Q1 # FH2012
"Génération création", our big gathering at Cirque d'Hiver, it's live and it's now! http://t.co/EaXM2v7g # FH2012
I answered a few questions from journalists before entering the Winter Circus for "Generation Creation": http://t.co/ZyZlQHwb # FH2012
Advice overload can become noise. When there is too much noise listen to the inner voice.
I arrive at the tribune of "Génération création", at the winter circus. Follow my speech live: http://t.co/EaXM2v7g # FH2012
The future of our country goes through a big project: that of culture. # FH2012
There is no better cause for the left than to defend freedom. # FH2012
The left does not have the monopoly of culture! We must have respect for those who do not think like us. # FH2012
I do not need to denigrate to be convincing myself! # FH2012
The incumbent does not defend his record. We can defend ours, especially in terms of culture! # FH2012
The abandonment of the general culture in the examinations of the grandes écoles. Why? # FH2012
History is no longer taught in scientific terminal classes. Why? # FH2012
I was at the living room of the #book. I met lovers of culture, who wore a badge to defend the princesses of Cleves! # FH2012
Never a princess in the history of the Republic will have received such popular support! # FH2012
I will restore the authority of the Ministry of Culture which has two vocations: to promote creation, and to democratize culture. # FH2012
The budget of the Ministry of Culture will be protected and protected. # FH2012
We have to promote French culture all over the world. # FH2012
Together, we will have to support artistic emergence. # FH2012
I proposed a great idea in this campaign: the "generational contract". It is also good for culture! http://t.co/doCx8a0O # FH2012
I will ask Parliament to pass a law on live performance. # FH2012
Culture is equality and everything starts at school. It is at school that all suns can be illuminated, as Jaurès said. # FH2012
Arts education will be a priority of the National Education. Teachers and artists will participate! # FH2012
We will ensure that this culture of heritage, through building sites, can be valued. # FH2012
Culture is also a language. This is the first link that brings us together. # FH2012
I do not accept that more than 15% of students entering 6th grade do not master the French language. # FH2012
Learning the French language will be a priority for National Education. # FH2012
I hope that the next President of the Republic will be a player in the next summit for the Francophonie. # FH2012
I will ratify the charter of regional languages. It's a wealth of more. # FH2012
I want to open act 2 of the cultural exception. # FH2012
@SabraNoordeen I hear you. Thanks for sharing.
We will have to fully recognize copyright. # FH2012
On the subject of digital, the incumbent has only oppose each other. #Hadopi # FH2012
The book faces in turn the technological upheavals. # FH2012
I will promote all initiatives that will bring the book sector together. # FH2012
Many countries are looking to France so that cinema can be defended everywhere. # FH2012
The French cultural exception must become the European cultural exception. # FH2012
The independence of the press is vital to our democracy. # FH2012
I will propose to open a debate on ways to strengthen the news media. # FH2012
We will have to strengthen the law on source protection. #freedomofpress # FH2012
Culture is openness to others. # FH2012
How can we accept that some artists could not come to France because they did not have the right visas? # FH2012
I welcome the Europeana initiative: the networking of major European libraries. # FH2012
Let's not forget Edgar Morin's warning: do not sacrifice the essentials to the emergency. # FH2012
How has a hierarchy of remuneration been allowed to settle which gives so little to tomorrow's demands? # FH2012
How can one stop the entry of foreign students who ask to be able to serve the French University? # FH2012
France is a great nation that can not be determined by fear. # FH2012
Europe is tempted by generalized austerity by binding to a treaty. So what? We would renegotiate it. # FH2012
I believe in the genius of France, that's why I believe in its culture. # FH2012
Culture must be at the service of emancipation and equality. # FH2012
May 6th will be a great day for France, for the Republic and for culture! # FH2012
President Suleiman offered his condolences to the Egyptians in general and to the Copts especially for the death of the Patriarch of the Coptic Orthodox Church and St. Mark Shenouda III
He considered the death of Pope Shenouda III a loss to Egypt and the Arab world, praising his open path to other religions and his stand against the Israeli enemy
Sleiman expressed his condolences to Copts & Egyptians for the death of Patriarchate Shnouda III, considering it a loss for the whole Arab world
Pr. Sleiman praised Patriarch Shnouda III's openness towards religions and his stance against Israel which led to his persecution and arrest
"My commitment to life": http://t.co/hetrFZsS
On 19 March we'll tweet live from "Together Against Discrimination" #LGBT #humanrights conference in Budva, #Montenegro. Follow #Me4Equality
#LGBT rights conference, 19 March, Budva, #Montenegro, PM Lukšić & distinguished regional & intl. speakers http://t.co/ZQHwGkTG #Me4Equality
#Montenegro #LGBT rights conference "Together Against Discrimination" will go live on official website: http://t.co/ZQHwGkTG. #Me4Equality
Find my speech on culture at the "Generation Creation" meeting tonight in Paris: http://t.co/WmtSOjse # FH2012
Salsa and more nothing! A hug to all and all alla in the square "Diego Ibarra" Go what flavorrrr!
Epa Héctor, Aranguibel, PérezPirela! Here I am, enjoying the program! A big hug, my dear comrades!
PHOTO: Talking with Andrew at Leader Joinery about his apprenticeship. TeamJG http://t.co/8nyG6tiH
Finally, VET diploma students will get the same rights university students have had for years - no upfront fees. http://t.co/iNtKFeM3 TeamJG
I'm going to send you a PerezPirela tie!
The PM is proposing that it's phased in from 2012, @infoxicatedlady. It will be discussed with State & Territory leaders next month. TeamJG
MDP MPs refuse to let Majlis function. Anni must take responsibility for the chaos as he is directing the chaos in Male'.
There is absolutely no excuse for the international community to ignore Anni's (former President Nasheed's) anarchic behavior.
I entered the Parliament floor. MDP disruptions continue.
I was elected by the people. I will perform my constitutional duty. #Maldives
All my life I was trained for this moment. I will uphold the constitution.
We begin tweeting live from Together Against Discrimination conference in #Montenegro. Hashtag is  #Me4Equality
#Me4Equality PM Lukšić, opening: #Montenegro sends strong message that we cherish diversity & aim to protect & include fully #LGBT persons.
#Me4Equality PM Lukšić: Traditional values can't be used to justify hate speech or any form of discrimination. #LGBT #humanrights
#Me4Equality #Croatia's Minister Opačić: Regional coop. is key. Democracy in a country as strong as its weakest citizen. #LGBT #humanrights
Follow live tweet from #LGBT conference in Budva, #Montenegro "Together Against Discrimination" at #Me4Equality
#Me4Equality #Croatia's Opačić reiterates #Montenegro PM Lukšić: Children should learn in schools there are people of different orientation.
#Me4Equality Institutional protection from discrimination & hate crimes due to sexual orientation must be firm & resloute #LGBT #humanrights
#Me4Equality @VladaRH Minister Opačić presents #Croatia's achievements in #LGBT #humanrights protection. Dialogue & cooperation is key.
#Me4Equality PM Lukšić has presented #Montenegro's legislation & institutional mechanisms which protect equal #humanrights for #LGBT persons
#Me4Equality #Kosovo's justice minister Kuçi quotes Martin Luther King: may "our children only be judged by the contents of their character"
#Me4Equality #Kosovo's Kuci: Pristina works towards safeguard of #humanrights of all & pursues anti-discrimination and inclusive policy.
Find my intervention this morning on France Info: http://t.co/7BeD8yIq # FH2012
I was horrified to learn of the killing that killed several people at the Ozar Hatora Jewish School in Toulouse.
This act, whose antisemitic character is as obvious as abject, bones the whole nation. #Toulouse
All means must be put in place to stop and punish the culprit of this ignominy. #Toulouse
I decided to go immediately to #Toulouse to bow to the victims.
and to show all my emotion and solidarity to their families and the Jewish community of France. #Toulouse
#Me4Equality conference is back at 11:30am CET, as mentioned, follow live webcast at: http://t.co/ZQHwGkTG and follow live tweet here.
#Me4Equality is back, on schedule are special addresses from regional and international officials. #Montenegro #LGBT #humanrights
#Me4Equality @councilofeurope's #humanrights & anti-discrimin. director Weingärtner quotes #CoE Jagland: Human rights are for all for none.
#Me4Equality @councilofeurope's Weingärtner discusses #European and #CoE legislation regarding #LGBT, commends #Montenegro's efforts & laws.
#Me4Equality @councilofeurope's Weingärtner says #CoE is first to establish a dedicated #LGBT Issues Unit in their #HumanRights Directorate.
#Me4Equality @Number10gov's Ms Reed, Head of #LGBT Equality @ Govt. Eq. Office: LGBT people still suffer great discrimination across #Europe
#Me4Equality Ms Reed disc. #UK legislation & efforts: Sport must be inclusive 4 all, including #LGBT. Transphobia & homophobia must go away.
#Me4Equality: #UK's Reed: Together with friends from #Montenegro and region, we can build a #Europe that fully welcomes #LGBT persons.
#Me4Equality #Bosnia's Deputy Min. #HumanRights &Minorities Ms Mitrović: Legal framework ensures full protection from #discrimination #LGBT
#Me4Equality #Macedonia's Deputy Minister Ibrahimi: Universal legal protection of #humanrights, #LGBT. All society stakeholders must unite.
#Me4Equality #Serbia's Directorate for H.&Min. Rights Đurđević: Legal framework good, but in practice #LGBT & other minorities discriminated
#Me4Equality #Serbia's Đurđević: Serbia is dedicated to working together w. @councilofeurope & others to combat #discrimination & improve.
#Me4Equality #Serbia's Đurđević discusses Serbia's efforts to raise awareness and ensure full protection and safety from #discrimination.
#Me4Equality #Serbia's Đurđević: We believe this conference may be used to build regional cooperation on issues of #LGBT discrimination.
#Me4Equality follow Conference live stream at official website: http://t.co/ZQHwGkTG. Direct link: http://t.co/iU9I6dnt
#Me4Equality #Austria's MP Schreuder: Great conference. #Europe is more than economy, we share traditions & values & learn from past.
#Me4Equality #Austria's MP Schreuder: #Europe must join to fight all discrimination, or there's no Europe. We move past history and improve.
#Me4Equality #Austria's MP Schreuder: In #US research showed that most prosperous cities are coincidentally also most "gay-friendly" cities.
#Me4Equality Ms Dawn Adie-Baird of #EU Delegation: We very much welcome #Montenegro’s efforts to promote #LGBT rights
#Me4Equality #Montenegro's Ambassador at MFAEI Janković: Montenegro's efforts towards anti-discrimination are recognised in region & beyond.
#Me4Equality Amb. Janković: #Montenegro grateful for intl. assistance in implementing best practices in #humanrights protection.
#Me4Equality Amb. Janković: In #Montenegro no systemic discrimination. There's always more to do, #humanrights must be continually protected
#Me4Equality Video-address: Dr Schrieder of PACE Intl. Institute for Peace: Protecting #LGBT is way to show they are part of society.
#Me4Equality #UK's Minister for Equalities Featherstone: Progress in #LGBT protection clearly visible in #Europe, but more needs to be done.
#Me4Equality #UK's Minister Featherstone: I applaud @MeGovernment for hosting conference & leadership in region in #LGBT protection.
#Me4Equality #UK's Minister Featherstone: Dialogue and cooperation only way to work towards #LGBT protection and make real difference.
#Me4Equality #Austria's Pres. of National Council Ms Prammer: I fully agree with aims of #LGBT conference in #Montenegro, Govt & NGO efforts
#Me4Equality: Next video address is by Ms Feldblum, #US Equal Opportunity Commissioner, follow live webcast at: http://t.co/iU9I6dnt
Dear @chaifeldblum, we are broadcasting live your address to #LGBT conference #Montenegro. Watch live @: http://t.co/iU9I6dnt #Me4Equality
#Me4Equality @chaifeldblum: #US pleased that high officials are standing up for #LGBT rights. Real change must happen in day-to-day activity
#Me4Equality: In video address, @chaifeldblum, #US Equal Opportunity Commissioner, says conference is "awesome" to teach new culture.
#Me4Equality, watch Bundestag's Mr Kauch video-address live stream at: http://t.co/iU9I6dnt
Departure for Toulouse, for a moment of meditation and a tribute to the victims: http://t.co/x0mJYFfD http://t.co/mSGAAq0x
#Me4Equality continues at 14:30 CET, watch the panel session live at: http://t.co/iU9I6dnt Speakers are experts and NGO representatives.
Every effort must be made to ensure that anti-Semitic acts and racism bring about a united and firm response from the entire Republic.
"The strength of the Republic in the face of ignominy": the entirety of my statement, a few moments ago, in Toulouse: http://t.co/x0mJYFfD
@steve_mbithi Pole sana. Kazi ni kubwa na changamoto pia bado ni nyingi. Kwa sera zetu za afya, juhudi na umoja wetu tutalifikia lengo.

Two hours ago, I arrived in Mauritania with the Minister of Justice and representatives from the Ministry of the Interior and Foreign Affairs to negotiate the extradition of the criminal Abdullah al-Senussi.
I am in Mauritania with the minister of Justice and reps from MoI and MoFA to request the extradition of the criminal Senussi to Libya.
Last night the Senate passed the Minerals Resource Rent Tax. Finally, all Australians will get a fair share of the mining boom. #FairGo JG
RT @SwannyDPM: Will help us deliver more super savings for 8.4m ppl, tax breaks for 2.7m small businesses and a company tax cut
@drdidier76. Muminsi micye tuzamenya ikibazo icyaricyo- PM n Min w'Ubuzima baraza kubisuzuma tugusubize....?
Ah, Tania, who was in Elorza tonight! I send my heart to my beloved town of Elorza, there in the Cajón de Arauca!
